document_data.name: The Scimitar
document_data.mainbody: '''The Scimitar''' was a thermal resort located alongside the shore of [[Lake Esmel]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Named after the scimitar-shaped peninsula in which it was located, this large resort was built near hot springs and had access to icy lake waters.
document_data.Services:
The Scimitar was a place of relaxation and hedonism. It offered a variety of services to its customers, such as:
* Bath houses
* Swimming
* Fishing
* Private gaming
* Gambling halls
* Dancing
It was known for the staff to also offer custom services to better satisfy their wealthy visitor's desires.

Although largely owned by the [[Church of Waukeen]], their [[priest]]s assumed no direct control over the resort. The place was managed by the [[Janyskyvaar Cabal]], a holding company watching over the interests of the majority shareholder, the [[Jashire]] family of [[Riatavin]].
document_data.Defenses: Customers entered the resort through a fortified gateway constantly guarded by mercenaries.
document_data.History: The resort was founded by a [[priest]] of [[Waukeen]] after he discovered mineral springs in [[Akarav's Bay]], giving his name to the bay in the process.
